title: No more missions?
body: I've completed three missions so far and no new missions aren't popping up? Is this an okay thing or is my client bugged. Please help!

replies.body: You should be getting new daily missions each day at about 11AM PT. Let me know if those missions never popped up for you and I can take a look at what's going on!

I don't get any missions at all
I began playing again yesterday and I heard about this thing called misssions, but I didnt see any.Now its been a day, and im still not getting any missions.
This was while the VS Event was going on. Since the event has ended, those missions have stopped.

[Still waiting for a response on when the final Order icon will be made available.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/uE3G94nX-now-that-the-vs-event-has-ended-order-icon)

 https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qo76vTf8wOk/WS9DHzVkkzI/AAAAAAABDuI/BXhrAKvmuLk4tn7BPjWbarrtyxLwi5FRACLcB/s1600/fc42083b7079ae68.jpg

Will it be 1500 IP (like it should) or 250 RP?

To quote the apparent essence of the comic, "there will always come two", then I'd like to see that being proved - so far we've only seen the one (Yasuo icon). ;)

AFAIK, the only icon of that pair that will be released is the winner's side - Yasuo. It wasn't stated anywhere that both icons would come out, but only that there would be a special icon representing the winner. 

With that being said, there's always a chance in the losing side's icon being released at some point later on!

I know it wasn't stated anywhere, that's why I'm asking, because I NEED that icon in my collection!
It's so much better than the Volcanic Wukong-something - this one is more "Kayle meets Leona", and you just have to praise _that_. :D

But I'll settle for this (for now), thank you. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Kw0syKXe,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-16T20:27:18.201+0000)
>
> You should be getting new daily missions each day at about 11AM PT. Let me know if those missions never popped up for you and I can take a look at what's going on!

lemme say i didnt get any missions today even tho i waited for the 11am pt time mark, like i got none (yesterday at the same time i got my missions and completed them), please tell me why am i not getting any missions
The Vs Event officially ended yesterday (6/29/2017). Missions should be returning at some point, so be sure to check up on the news and patch notes to know when they're back!

That's strange, because it says for me that the "Versus tokens will expire and no longer be obtainable after 7/24/17 and 23:59 PT"  Does this mean they are supposed to be obtainable still, or is there a new event coming in soon/already here that we are not aware of.  Also, if you would like a screenshot of what I see because it is not supposed to be there, what would be the best way of doing that?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} PEACE

I'd actually love to see that screenshot because the official versus event page states:

> Q: What happens to my tokens after the event?
> A: You’ll have until 7/24/17 23:59 PT to craft leftover tokens into batches of Blue Essence (every 10 tokens = 10 Blue Essence). If you don’t craft the tokens by the deadline, they will disappear.

Okay, I put the picture of the client onto google docs because I see no way to upload it here, it is difficult to read normally, so I recommend increasing the zoom on your browser.  Here is the link to the document:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/16O4CDH-sbDCAggqsZjsNtbxS8l1jc88RnzRw6l4uD7I/edit?usp=sharing
I also do not see a way to convert it into blue essence like the versus event page states.  Is there anything else that you need to know?

Ahhhhhh you were getting that quote from the client side. Yea....the way that sentence is worded might be taken as if you could still get tokens up until the 24th, but it just means that the tokens won't disappear until then. Tokens mainly came from missions which ended on 6/29.

You'll be able to turn extra token into blue essence by clicking on the tokens and then scrolling down to the blue essence options.
Alright, thanks!  Do you know roughly when the next event will be, or is it "classified"?
Heeeeeeey a poro's gotta have some secrets right XP! Leeeeet's saaaaaaay.........Soon™ ^_^
so it already ended? i can't get anymore order things? i only needed 10 more to get the thing i wanted ahhhh..... is there anything i could do to get 10 more?

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Kw0syKXe,comment-id=000000040000,timestamp=2017-06-30T20:21:18.303+0000)

its been like 3 days since my last mission, and i still have no new missions
It's been a few days for me as well and I haven't gotten any new missions.
I am having the same issue. All my other friends I play with have already gotten theirs. It's 6:00 pm my time, so I figured it'd be out already for me, too. But no new missions are popping up.

Hmmmm that's pretty strange if you haven't gotten any missions at all today. 

I've got your account history pulled up, and it looks like you've already completed the missions for today. Once they refresh tomorrow at 11am PT you'll be able to get more finished.
I haven't gotten any missions either, if you could spare the time could you check mine too and see if there's anything wrong ?
The daily missions reset at about 11AM PT, let me know if you still don't have any missions at all!
I dont get any new mission in past 3 days idk what to do...
hi! i havent gotten any missions the past 2 days so and i bought both passes and its a little upsetting so if you could please look into this i would greatly appreciate it!! thank you!
So are the missions over now? Haven't gotten a mission for world tokens in a while.
i have no daily missions for more than 3 days now :/
I still have no missions. Did the whole thing stop?  was it only for an event??[Image](http://prntscr.com/ft8uq2)
im not geting any new mission. why?
Hi it has been 2 days now and no new missions for me :S only 2 a day and then none :(  Can you pls check this out for me?
Has 2 days does not give me any missions can anyone help me
Same here, got no new quests for the last 2 days.
Ive pressed the mission tab , there were 2 things that just disapeared in 0.5 seconds. Gg riot
The event ended on the 29th or something like that.
iv played 4 mission nd my last missions were last night... but iv got no missions today... pls help me

missions wont re-spawn for 6 more hours
